title: Variable Refresh Rate support is coming to your PS5 this week
content:
After rolling out variable refresh rate (VRR) support to its 2021 Bravia XR TV lineup early last month, Sony is now finally bringing the feature to the PlayStation 5. The company announced the rollout in a recent blog post, confirming that it should reach all players by the end of this week. In addition, Sony

The post Variable Refresh Rate support is coming to your PS5 this week appeared first on XDA.
description: Sony has finally announced that it will start rolling out a new firmware update to enable variable refresh rate support on the PlayStation 5 this week.
